moduleObjectives: Understand the fundamental principles of sensors and actuators in robotics.
Learn about the different types of sensors used in robotics.
Explore the various types of actuators and their applications.
Gain insights into the integration and calibration of sensors and actuators.

content.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Sensors and Actuators
Chapter 2: Types of Sensors in Robotics
Chapter 3: Types of Actuators in Robotics

additionalResources.textbookTitle: Artificial Intelligence in Robotics: Transforming the Future
